Nice interior - but regarding meals, one feels a little bit trapped:salmon tartar - with 10% Salmon, lots of apples mixed with it...Pizza Mascarpone / Speck: looking for the speck?! but again: apple on it ;-)Tagliatelle Rustica: without any taste of the ingredients...Lambrusco not by the glassRather big portions...but big does not come with delicious meals...Waiter friendly but understaffedok - but not more undortunately. we expected more...
